explains: adv. 充分地，足够地；适当地

sentences.en: They felt slighted by not being adequately consulted.
sentences.cn: 因为没有充分地征求他们的意见，他们感到被怠慢了。

sentences.en: Few, though, can adequately explain how acupuncture works.
sentences.cn: 然而，几乎没有人能充分解释针灸是如何起作用的。

sentences.en: They had equipped their workers adequately for such dangerous condition.
sentences.cn: 他们让工人们充分装备起来，以应付这样的危险情况。
